Class TableDBController

java.lang.Object
dbLogic.restaurantDB.TableDBController
public class TableDBController extends Object
Database access controller for restaurant table management. * This class centralizes all database operations related to tables, including availability queries, capacity calculations, and table state updates.

  • Constructor Details

    • TableDBController

      public TableDBController()

  • Method Details

    • getCandidateTables

      public static List<Integer> getCandidateTables(int numberOfGuests)
      Retrieves a list of available table IDs that can accommodate the given number of guests. The result is ordered by table capacity in ascending order to enable a "Best-Fit" strategy.
      Parameters:
      numberOfGuests - The minimum required seating capacity.
      Returns:
      A List of candidate table IDs that are currently available.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getRestaurantMaxCapacity

      public static int getRestaurantMaxCapacity()
      Calculates the total maximum seating capacity of the restaurant by summing all table capacities.
      Returns:
      The total restaurant seating capacity.

    • getUnavailableCapacity

      public static int getUnavailableCapacity() throws SQLException
      Calculates the total seating capacity currently occupied by unavailable tables. This represents capacity taken by active diner visits.
      Returns:
      Total occupied seating capacity.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • setTableUnavailable

      public static void setTableUnavailable(int tableId) throws Exception
      Marks a specific table as unavailable in the database. Used when a table is assigned to an active visit.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table to update.
      Throws:
      Exception - If a database error occurs.

    • getTableCapacity

      public static int getTableCapacity(int tableId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the seating capacity of a specific table.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The unique identifier of the table.
      Returns:
      The seating capacity.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the table does not exist or a DB error occurs.

    • getAllTables

      public static List<Table> getAllTables()
      Retrieves all tables stored in the system, including capacity and availability status.
      Returns:
      A List of all Table objects.

    • addNewTable

      public static boolean addNewTable(int capacity)
      Adds a new table to the restaurant using a transaction. Updates both the 'table' entity table and the 'restaurant_table' mapping table.
      Parameters:
      capacity - Seating capacity of the new table.
      Returns:
      true if added successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Internal transaction handling.

    • deleteTable

      public static boolean deleteTable(int tableId)
      Deletes a table from the system. Reassigns existing visits to an archive table (-1) to maintain referential integrity.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table to remove.
      Returns:
      true if deletion and cache refresh succeeded, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Internal transaction handling.

    • updateTableCapacity

      public static boolean updateTableCapacity(int tableId, int newCapacity)
      Updates the seating capacity of an existing table.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table to update.
      newCapacity - The new capacity value.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.
